name: Anhangá
description:
Anhangá

It is a stealth / puzzle game with top view where the player controls a transmorph spirit, which aims to save the different animals of the hunters and return with them to the forest, all this without drawing attention. Combining the transformations of the character with the personalities of the animals all this in short phases that make the player have to create his strategy to pass of phase.
The game has as inspiration for the character the indigenous myth of Anhangá.
